name: handful
posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

dsense.name: handful
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: an amount of something that can be held in one hand

example.eg: He pulled out a handful of coins from his pocket.
example.egtrans: 他从口袋里掏出一把硬币。

dsense.name: handful
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: a small number of people or things

example.eg: She invited all her friends to her party, but only a handful of them turned up.
example.egtrans: 她请了很多朋友参加她的聚会，但只有少数几个到场。

dsense.name: handful
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: a person, often a child, who is difficult to control

example.eg: Her older son is fine but the little one is a bit of a handful.
example.egtrans: 她的大儿子很好，但小儿子有点难管。
